quotes.message: Opportunists seek for a chance. Entrepreneurs make new chances.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Out there in some garage is an entrepreneur who's forging a bullet with your company's name on it.
quotes.name: Gary Hamel

quotes.message: The one thing all entrepreneurs have in common is that they started. The one thing everyone else has in common is that they haven't.
quotes.name: Ryan Lilly

quotes.message: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
quotes.name: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.message: A successful entrepreneur can't be afraid of failures or setbacks. An initial setback can be a great opportunity to take a new and more promising approach to any problem, to come back stronger than ever.
quotes.name: John Roos

quotes.message: An entrepreneur is someone who jumps off a cliff and builds a plane on the way down.
quotes.name: Reid Hoffman

quotes.message: An entrepreneur is someone who can make enough money to pay for their mistakes.
quotes.name: Jayson Gaignard

quotes.message: Everyone is an entrepreneur. The only skills you need to be an entrepreneur: an ability to fail, an ability to have ideas, to sell those ideas, to execute on those ideas, and to be persistent so even as you fail you learn and move onto the next adventure.
quotes.name: James Altucher

quotes.message: An entrepreneur isn't someone who owns a business, it is someone who makes things happen.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: My best advice to entrepreneurs is this: Forget about making mistakes, just do it.
quotes.name: Ajaero Tony Martins

quotes.message: The hardest part about being an entrepreneur is that you'll fail ten times for every success.
quotes.name: Adam Horowitz

quotes.message: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
quotes.name: Henry Kravis

quotes.message: It's the combination: big idea with a good entrepreneur: there's nothing more powerful.
quotes.name: Bill Drayton

quotes.message: Any successful entrepreneur knows that time is more valuable than money itself.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: Everyone can tell you the risk. An entrepreneur can see the reward.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: All humans are entrepreneurs not because they should start companies but because the will to create is encoded in human DNA.
quotes.name: Reid Hoffman

quotes.message: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: An entrepreneur assumes the risk and is dedicated and committed to the success of whatever he or she undertakes.
quotes.name: Victor Kiam

quotes.message: I think if you're an entrepreneur, you've got to dream big and then dream bigger.
quotes.name: Howard Schultz

quotes.message: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: A smart entrepreneur knows they can not run a business on their own. They know that business is a team sport.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Entrepreneur is not a job title. It is a state of mind of people who want to alter the future.
quotes.name: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.message: Entrepreneur, make today count but don't let the day count you.
quotes.name: Onyi Anyado

quotes.message: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don't, you're going to regret it.
quotes.name: Catherine Cook

quotes.message: An entrepreneur without funding is a musician without an instrument.
quotes.name: Robert A. Rice Jr.

quotes.message: Entrepreneurs don't finish when we are tired. We finish when we are done.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: The entrepreneur is essentially a visualizer and actualizer. He can visualize something, and when he visualizes it he sees exactly how to make it happen.
quotes.name: Robert L. Schwartz

quotes.message: The world's most successful entrepreneurs play hard, but they work even harder.
quotes.name: Ben Parr

quotes.message: An entrepreneur is someone who dares to dream the dreams and is foolish enough to try to make those dreams come true.
quotes.name: Vinod Khosla

quotes.message: Entrepreneurs: See yourself as victorious- and the best way to be victorious is to be passionate.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: Entrepreneurs see the â€œno divingâ€ sign and back-up to get a running start.
quotes.name: Ryan Lilly

quotes.message: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: The strongest thing you can cultivate as an entrepreneur is to not rely on luck but cultivating an ability to recognize fortunate situations when they are occurring.
quotes.name: Jack Dorsey

quotes.message: Entrepreneurs see what others can't, do what others won't, and accomplish what others dream.
quotes.name: Ryan Lilly

quotes.message: Entrepreneurs are simply those who understand that there is little difference between obstacle and opportunity and are able to turn both to their advantage.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: The entrepreneur builds an enterprise; the technician builds a job.
quotes.name: Michael Gerber

quotes.message: An entrepreneur is born, when a person has more reasons to drive his dreams against his excuses.
quotes.name: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.message: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't so you can spend the rest of your life like most people can't.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Being an entrepreneur is like eating glass and staring into the abyss of death.
quotes.name: Elon Musk

quotes.message: The future will be owned and operated by the entrepreneurially minded.
quotes.name: Mark Victor Hanses

quotes.message: Entrepreneur is someone who has a vision for something and a want to create.
quotes.name: David Karp

quotes.message: As an entrepreneur, you have to be OK with failure. If you're not failing, you're likely not pushing yourself hard enough.
quotes.name: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.message: You can't study to be an entrepreneur. Sometimes you just have to jump.
quotes.name: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.message: I wasn't born a natural entrepreneur. I had to be trained.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: If you're an entrepreneur and you think that the president makes a difference to your business, you should stay at your current job.
quotes.name: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.message: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he'll quickly learn how to chew it.
quotes.name: Roy Ash

quotes.message: Smart entrepreneurs learn that they must fail often and fast.
quotes.name: Alain Bouchard

quotes.message: I'd rather invest in an entrepreneur who has failed before than one who assumes success from day one.
quotes.name: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.message: Entrepreneurship is neither a science nor an art. It is a practice.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker
